test_setup.given: Todo manager system is running.

test_cases.description: Verify that the endpoint rejects requests with invalid Priority value if Priority has allowed values.

test_setup.given: Priority must be 'Low', 'Medium', or 'High'.
test_setup.then: Request is rejected with status 400 and error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with Priority 'Urgent'.

test_cases.description: Verify that the endpoint rejects requests with Due_date in invalid format.

test_setup.then: Request is rejected with status 400 and error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with Due_date '07-07-2024'.

test_cases.description: Verify that the endpoint accepts a Title at the maximum allowed length.
test_cases.name: Title Max Length Edge Case

test_setup.given: Title max length is 255 characters.
test_setup.then: Task is added successfully and returned with status 201.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with Title at max length.

test_cases.description: Verify that the endpoint rejects a Title exceeding the maximum allowed length.
test_cases.name: Title Over Max Length Edge Case

response_body_json.error: Title exceeds maximum length of 255 characters.

test_setup.given: Title max length is 255 characters.
test_setup.then: Request is rejected with status 400 and error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with Title over max length.

test_cases.description: Verify that the endpoint rejects requests where mandatory fields are empty strings.
test_cases.name: Empty String Fields

response_body_json.error: Fields cannot be empty: Title, Description, Priority, Due_date, User_name, Location

test_setup.given: Mandatory fields must have non-empty values.
test_setup.then: Request is rejected with status 400 and error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with empty strings for all fields.
